member.summary: Creates a new window and attaches it to the current context.

The x-coordinate at which to position the window's top-left corner.
The y-coordinate at which to position the window's top-left corner.
The width of the window's client area in pixels.
The height of the window's client area in pixels.
A set of WindowFlags values indicating how to create the window.
member.returns: The Ultraviolet window that was created.

member.name: M:Ultraviolet.SDL2.Platform.SDL2UltravioletWindowInfo.CreateFromNativePointer(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Creates a new Ultraviolet window from the specified native window and attaches it to the current context.
member.param: A pointer that represents the native window to attach to the context.
member.returns: The Ultraviolet window that was created.

member.name: M:Ultraviolet.SDL2.Platform.SDL2UltravioletWindowInfo.Destroy(Ultraviolet.Platform.IUltravioletWindow)
member.summary: Destroys the specified window.
member.remarks: Windows which were created from native pointers are disassociated from the current context, but are not actually destroyed. To destroy such windows, use the native framework which created them.
member.param: The Ultraviolet window to destroy.
member.returns: true if the window was destroyed; false if the window was closed.

member.name: M:Ultraviolet.SDL2.Platform.SDL2UltravioletWindowInfo.DestroyByID(System.Int32)
member.summary: Destroys the window with the specified identifier.
member.param: The identifier of the window to destroy.
member.returns: true if the window was destroyed; false if the window was closed.

member.name: T:Ultraviolet.SDL2.SDL2StreamWrapper
member.summary: Represents a wrapper around a which is compatible with SDL2's RWops API.

member.name: T:Ultraviolet.SDL2.SDL2StreamWrapper.RWops_size
member.summary: Represents the method which is called to retrieve the size of an SDL_RWops stream.

member.name: T:Ultraviolet.SDL2.SDL2StreamWrapper.RWops_seek
member.summary: Represents the method which is called to seek to a position within an SDL_RWops stream.

member.name: T:Ultraviolet.SDL2.SDL2StreamWrapper.RWops_read
member.summary: Represents the method which is called to seek to read data from an SDL_RWops stream.

member.name: T:Ultraviolet.SDL2.SDL2StreamWrapper.RWops_write
member.summary: Represents the method which is called to seek to write data to an SDL_RWops stream.

member.name: T:Ultraviolet.SDL2.SDL2StreamWrapper.RWops_close
member.summary: Represents the method which is called to seek to close an SDL_RWops stream.

member.name: T:Ultraviolet.SDL2.SDL2StreamWrapper.SDL_RWops
member.summary: Note that this is NOT a complete specification of the SDL_RWops structure, which is a big complicated union full of platform-specific data. We're only declaring what we need for our stream wrapper, and trusting that if we set to SDL_RWOPS_UNKNOWN that SDL2 isn't going to try to access the memory that we're neglecting to allocate.

member.name: M:Ultraviolet.SDL2.SDL2StreamWrapper.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The stream which will be wrapped by this object.

member.name: M:Ultraviolet.SDL2.SDL2StreamWrapper.ToIntPtr
member.summary: Gets a which represents the wrapper's underlying SDL_RWops structure.
member.returns: A pointer to the native RWops structure which this object represents.

member.name: M:Ultraviolet.SDL2.SDL2StreamWrapper.RWops_size_callback(Ultraviolet.SDL2.SDL2StreamWrapper.SDL_RWops*)
member.summary: Implements the size() callback for this stream.

member.summary: Implements the seek() callback for this stream.

member.summary: Implements the read() callback for this stream.

member.summary: Implements the write() callback for this stream.

member.name: M:Ultraviolet.SDL2.SDL2StreamWrapper.RWops_close_callback(Ultraviolet.SDL2.SDL2StreamWrapper.SDL_RWops*)
member.summary: Implements the close() callback for this stream.

member.summary: Releases memory associated with the object.
